content: **this super simple hanger is perfect for organizing yours or your kiddos hair clips in one location designed to pack in operation christmas child shoeboxes but work great for taking on trips or in the home finished organizer should measure approximately 8 long not counting the hanger & 2 wide but may differ depending on your yarn choice & can be easily adapted to any length ** if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns please join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/869715883461437/ check out regina p designs website to find out more get sneak peeks free patterns & sales https //www reginapdesigns com/ ***materials *** red heart super saver or any ww4/aran/10 ply yarn approx 18 yds h 5 mm hook scissors needle ***abbreviations us terms *** skip = skip sts = stitches st = stitch sl= slip_stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet
